title: nIlOtpalAmbikAyAm
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikAyAm bhaktim karOmi


anupallavi

 nIlOtpalanAyaka samEtAyAm nikhilAgama sannutAyAm nIlAmbara puSpa mAlA vrtAyAm


caraNam   kavijanAdi mOdinyAm kamalEsha pAlinyAm sUryakOTi prakAshinyAm 
sUrijanOpAsita pUrvagauLa prakAshinyAm avidyA vidyA svarUpiNyAm 
Arakta varNa rUpiNyAm ibhavadana guruguhAdi jananyAm
